content:
IContainsThemedScrollbarWindows Interface

Definition

Defines a method for getting information about how the scrollbars of windows need to be themed when displayed in the Visual Studio designer.

In this Article

public interface IContainsThemedScrollbarWindows

Methods

ThemedScrollbarWindows()

Gets an enumeration of ThemedScrollbarWindow objects that represent windows and how their scrollbars need to be themed when displayed in the Visual Studio designer.

public System.Collections.IEnumerable ThemedScrollbarWindows ();
Returns
IEnumerable

An enumeration of objects that represent windows and how their scrollbars need to be themed when displayed in the Visual Studio designer.
